name: Injured Fury+
desc:
If unit is below 75% Max HP, Quick Fang gains +3 additional bonus attacks
Unit takes 15 recoil damage after attack if HP is above 75% Max HP.
components: (combat_calcs.attack_speed(unit, item) > combat_calcs.attack_speed(target, item) + 6 and mode == "attack") and (unit.get_hp() <= unit.get_max_hp() // 1.3333) and (has_skill(unit, 'Quick_Fang'))
